resources:
Bisq Register Next LEARN MORE Done OK Send email with Bisq Phone ID Settings
Bisq is an open-source desktop application that allows you to buy and sell bitcoins in exchange for national currencies, or alternative crypto currencies. Do you want to use your computer's webcam or do you want to send an email to yourself? Now you can receive Bisq notifications on your phone. Register your phone with Bisq Please copy this Bisq Phone ID string into the field "Bisq Phone ID" in the Bisq App:

 

The Bisq Phone ID contains (1) your excryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by Bisq to encrypt the notifications for you and (2) a token from Apple that identifies this instance of the Bisq remote app. Bisq mobile Open the email on your computer.

Then open the Bisq app and copy & paste the Bisq Phone ID from the email into the field "Bisq Phone ID". Go to your computer and open the Bisq App.

Settings -> Bisq Mobile

Then press "Webcam" and scan this QR code.

Your phone will receive a confirmation notification. confirmation received
INSTRUCTIONS RESEND EMAILxc
